sections.title: Welcome to Wildsky
sections.subtitle: Protecting Our Dark Skies
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Explore the wonders of the night sky without the glare of artificial lights. Join us in preserving our dark skies for future generations.

images.name: dark_sky_banner.jpg
images.description: A panoramic view of a starlit sky free from light pollution.

sections.title: About Wildsky
sections.subtitle: Our Mission & Vision
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: At Wildsky, our mission is to safeguard the natural beauty of the night sky. Our vision is a world where everyone has access to the majesty of the heavens, and communities thrive economically and environmentally due to dark sky preservation.

images.name: mission_background.jpg
images.description: A serene setting depicting a clear, star-filled night sky.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Dark Sky Compliance Consulting**: We guide businesses and municipalities in achieving dark sky-friendly regulations.
- **Educational Workshops**: Learn about the importance of preserving night skies and how it benefits ecosystems.
- **Community Engagement Programs**: Collaborate with local groups to promote dark sky awareness.
- **Light Pollution Audits**: Assess and provide solutions to mitigate light pollution in your area.

sections.title: Benefits of Dark Skies
sections.name: benefits
sections.label: Benefits
sections.content:
### Environmental Benefits
- Supports nocturnal wildlife by preserving natural night conditions.
- Reduces energy consumption, leading to lower carbon footprints.

### Economic Benefits
- Boosts local tourism with attractions like stargazing festivals.
- Increases property values as communities become desirable living locations.

images.name: environmental_benefits.png
images.description: An infographic showcasing the environmental benefits of dark sky preservation.

images.name: economic_benefits.png
images.description: An infographic detailing the economic advantages linked to dark skies.

sections.title: Dark Sky Regulations & Resources
sections.name: resources
sections.label: Resources
sections.content:
Learn about local and national regulations affecting light pollution. Access resources to help your community or organization in adopting dark sky-friendly practices. 
- **Guideline PDFs**
- **Toolkits for Schools**
- **Governmental Policies**

images.name: pdf_icon.png
images.description: An icon representing downloadable PDF resources.

images.name: toolkit_icon.png
images.description: An icon symbolizing educational toolkits available for schools.

images.name: government_icon.png
images.description: An icon for governmental policies related to dark sky initiatives.
